hero.heading: Unbound Pivot
hero.description: Break free from limitations and step into your authentic power with our comprehensive platform for self inner mastery.

painPoints.heading: Are You Struggling With Any Of These?
items: Feeling stuck and unfulfilled in life
Self-doubt and imposter syndrome holding you back
Anxiety and stress overwhelming your daily life
Lack of clear direction or life purpose
Feeling disconnected from your authentic self
Negative thought patterns you can't break
Feeling lost and unsure of your next steps

cta.tagline: If any of these resonate with you...
cta.description: Unbound Pivot is designed to help you break free and step into your power.

features.heading: What's Included
features.description: Everything you need for complete inner mastery and personal transformation.
items: Heal Confidence, Anxiety, Loneliness, Self Doubt Issues

testimonials.name: Virgi J
testimonials.text: Something within me is shifting—quietly, but with real power. My world feels lighter, clearer. I approach life and business with a sharper focus and deeper sense of purpose.
testimonials.transformation: From Hidden Potential to Authentic Power

testimonials.name: Simeon Mihinga
testimonials.text: Pivot Simply is really an ideal business coaching programme for both men and women, especially those fearing to start and grow their businesses.

testimonials.name: Caroline Beattie
testimonials.text: I joined the Conscious Creator Membership and this is the best way I have invested in myself. An interesting road to discovery with usable tools for everyday self care and healing.

finalCTA.heading: Ready to Transform Your Life?
finalCTA.description: Join thousands who have already started their inner mastery journey.
